Entries.NPC.cs.4275: For my birthday? What a great gift! Thanks!

Entries.Ayeisha: I love the smell and sound of the rain. I find it really relaxing.#$b#Even if I am walking in it.$h#$e#I guess you have to work in the rain a lot too.

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie looks really cute and fun

AfterMovie.Text: That was a really sweet movie.

BeforeMovie.Text: I remember playing the game, I can't remember the plot tho.

AfterMovie.Text: That movie was great! Makes me want to play the game again now! $h

BeforeMovie.Text: I don't know anything about this movie. It looks unusual.

AfterMovie.Text: That was a very odd movie. I kind of liked it.

BeforeMovie.Text: I remember seeing this on TV as a child. I don't think I liked it much but maybe my taste has changed.

AfterMovie.Text: Did you enjoy it? I don't think my opinion of it has changed sadly. $s

BeforeMovie.Text: I've been wanting to see this since I saw a trailer for it. $h

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me. I loved it! $h
That film was hilarious. I had a great time. Thanks for inviting me. $h

BeforeMovie.Text: I don't really like horror movies but I'll try to like it.

AfterMovie.Text: Sorry I really didn't enjoy that at all. I had to close my eyes for most of it. $s

BeforeMovie.Text: I've not seen a black and white movie for a long time. I don't think I've ever seen this one.

AfterMovie.Text: That was nice. I can see why it's a classic.

Entries.64271002/f Pierre 1250/t 900 1700: playful/6 21/farmer 12 27 3 Pierre 4 17 2 Caroline 10 17 0 Ayeisha 6 29 0/skippable/move Ayeisha 0 -8 0/speak Ayeisha "Hi Pierre! I have a package for you."/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 500/move Pierre 0 0 2/pause 400/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 300/move Pierre 0 0 2/pause 200/jump Pierre/textAboveHead Pierre "!?!?"/showFrame Pierre 16/shake Pierre 800/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 800/speed Pierre 4/advancedMove Pierre false -2 0 0 2 4 0 0 1/pause 1600/speak Pierre "Thank you Ayeisha. However can you be a little more discreet next time.$s"/advancedmove Caroline false 4 0 0 -5 4 0/speak Pierre "Because...$4"/pause 200/move Pierre 0 0 0/pause 400/move Pierre 0 0 2/speak Pierre "...I have some deliveries that I would like to keep secret.$4"/pause 300/speak Ayeisha "Sure thing.$h"/move Ayeisha 0 9 2/pause 150/playSound doorClose/warp Ayeisha -100 -100/pause 500/speak Pierre "Now I need to hide this somewhere."/globalFade/end position 6 29

Entries.64271003/f Willy 1250/t 900 1700/z summe: distantBanjo/6 6/farmer 6 7 1 Willy 5 4 2 Ayeisha 5 9 0/skippable/move Ayeisha 0 -3 0/speak Ayeisha "Hey Willy, I have some letters and your magazine subscription for you today."/speak Willy "Ah... Me favorite magazine, The Ferngill Angler.$h#$b#But is there anythin' I can do for ya today?"/speak Ayeisha "There is actually. Do you have any fresh sardines? I want a couple as a small treat for my cats."/speak Willy "Give me a moment."/pause 100/showFrame Willy 25/pause 1000/showFrame Willy 0/speak Willy "Here ya go, two fresh sardines.$h"/speak Ayeisha "Thanks Willy. How much do I owe you?"/speak Willy "Nothin', they're on me.$h"/speak Ayeisha "Oh wow! Thanks.$h"/speak Willy "Me pleasure.$h"/move Ayeisha 0 3 2/playSound doorClose/warp Ayeisha -100 -100/globalFade/end position 5 9

Entries.64271004/f Lewis 1250/t 830 1400/w sunny: distantBanjo/56 87/farmer 54 83 1 Lewis 65 86 4 Ayeisha 54 95 0/skippable/animate Lewis false true 500 16 17/move Ayeisha 0 -7 1/speak Ayeisha "Hello Lewis. I think this package is for you."/pause 200/stopAnimation Lewis 12/advancedMove Lewis false 0 2 -10 0/speak Ayeisha "The label has been damaged but it looks like your address."/pause 800/speak Ayeisha "Seems to be from Lucky Shorts C..."/speak Lewis "Yep.$2"/speak Lewis "That's mine.$5"/speak Lewis "Thank you.$2"/pause 500/speed Lewis 4/advancedMove Lewis false 4 0 0 -2/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis -100 -100/globalFade/end

Entries.64271005/f Gus 1250/t 1230 1500: ragtime/14 17/farmer 9 22 1 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 10 17 0 Ayeisha 14 24 0/move Ayeisha 0 -4 0/speak Ayeisha "Hi Gus. I have a large package for you today."/speak Gus "Great! My free drink samples arrived.$h#$b#Do you want to try one and let me know what you think?"/speak Ayeisha "Sure."/playSound gulp/playSound gulp/pause 1000/move Ayeisha 0 0 2/showFrame Ayeisha 20/emote Ayeisha 60/pause 1000/move Ayeisha 0 0 0/speak Ayeisha "*blech* What was that?!$6"/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Gus "Peanut butter soda."/speak Ayeisha "Tasted more like mud soda.$s"/speak Gus "I'm sorry.$s#$b#Let me make it up to you with something nicer."/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Ayeisha "Thanks. I'm ahead of schedule and can use a 5 minute break."/advancedMove Gus false 4 0 0 -1/move Ayeisha -1 0 1/showFrame Ayeisha 17/pause 1200/globalFade/end

Entries.64271006/f MisterGinger 750/k 5295000/t: distantBanjo/90 23/farmer 83 23 1 MisterGinger 90 23 2 Ayeisha 97 24 4/animate MisterGinger false true 400 29 30 31/move Ayeisha -7 0 0/speak Ayeisha "Hello Mr Ginger."/stopAnimation MisterGinger 26/speak MisterGinger "Meow."/speak Ayeisha "A little bird asked me to give you a package.$h"/speak MisterGinger "Mreoow??$l"/speak Ayeisha "Let me open it for you."/speak MisterGinger "Mirp!$h"/speak Ayeisha "Oh look! It's one of your favorite fish and no bones!$h"/speak MisterGinger "Meooow meooww!$l"/emote MisterGinger 20/pause 1000/speak MisterGinger "Mrr$6"/speak Ayeisha "I'm glad you like it!$h"/end

Entries.34/f Penny 500/t 900 1400/w sunny: 50s/49 64/farmer 43 64 1 Penny 59 69 1 George 51 64 0 Gus 37 70 3 Abigail -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 700/emote George 28/pause 500/speak George "*Sigh*... How am I going to reach that letter in the back?$s"/move Penny -1 0 0/move Penny 0 -5 3/move Penny -3 0 3/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speed Penny 4/move Penny -3 0 3/faceDirection George 1/pause 400/showFrame Penny 20/pause 400/speak Penny "Here, let me help you, Mr. Mullner!"/pause 400/speed Penny 2/move Penny 0 1 3/move Penny -2 0 0/move Penny 0 -1 1/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/showFrame Penny 5/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/showFrame Penny 4/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/showFrame Penny 5/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/showFrame Penny 4/showFrame Penny 21/move George 1 0 1 true/emote George 16/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/showFrame Penny 22/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/faceDirection Penny 1/move Penny 1 0 1/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 0/playSound openBox/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "There you go!$h"/pause 300/emote George 12/speak George "Hmmph. I could've done it myself! And I can certainly move around on my own!$u#$b#How feeble do you think I am?"/move farmer 6 0 1/pause 200/faceDirection George 3/emote George 8/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Penny "$q 71 null#@? You were watching us?#$r 71 50 event_mail1#I was. You did a kind thing there, Penny.#$r 71 -50 event_mail2#I was. You should've asked instead of assuming George wanted help.#$r 71 0 event_mail3#I'm just taking a walk, minding my own business."/pause 400/faceDirection George 2/pause 800/showFrame George 16/pause 500/emote George 28/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 1/speak George "*sigh*...No, no... I'm sorry, miss. I shouldn't have gotten so angry.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection George 3/pause 400/speak George "It was actually very kind of you to help me out."/pause 400/speak Penny "That's okay, Mr. Mullner. I understand."/warp Abigail 44 1/pause 500/move Abigail 0 8 2 true/move George 5 0 0 false/pause 550/move Abigail -18 0 2 true/warp George -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 600/emote Penny 28/pause 700/faceDirection Penny 3/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 600/speak Penny "$q -1 null#It must be difficult to grow old...$u#$r -1 0 event_old1#I'd rather not think about it.#$r -1 0 event_old2#It's just a different part of life.#$r -1 0 event_old3#That's why we should respect our elders.#$r -1 0 event_old4#I'd rather die young..."/pause 500/emote Penny 40/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Penny "Well, it was interesting talking to you, @. I should go.$u"/showFrame Penny 20/pause 500/showFrame Penny 12/pause 900/move Penny 6 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.choseToBeKnown: pause 200/addConversationTopic pamHouseUpgrade/speak Robin "Okay... let's go."/pause 500/move Robin 0 1 2/move farmer 0 2 2 true/move Robin 0 3 1 false/move Robin 2 0 1/move farmer 3 0 1/move farmer 0 1 1/faceDirection Pam 3/move Penny 0 -1 3/move Penny -1 0 3/speak Robin "Hi there, neighbors... that's a nice new house you got there!$4"/pause 250/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Pam "Robin... I... I dunno what to say...$s#$b#This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.$s"/faceDirection Pam 2/animate Pam false true 100 25/pause 1000/animate Pam false true 150 26 27/pause 1000/speak Penny "Robin, thank you so much...$s"/speak Robin "Hey, don't thank me! This was @'s idea... And he paid for the whole thing, too!^Hey don't thank me! This was @'s idea... And she paid for the whole thing, too!"/pause 100/stopAnimation Pam/showFrame Pam 12/pause 500/speak Penny "@... This is absolutely incredible...$7#$b#I... I don't know what else to say...$s"/stopAnimation Pam/faceDirection Pam 3/stopAnimation Penny/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 300/speak Pam "This must have cost a fortune, @...$s#$b#...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this?$4"/pause 300/question fork1 "...#It's a gift... no repayment needed.#You can start by treating Penny better..."/fork itsagift/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 2/showFrame Pam 25/pause 250/faceDirection Penny 2/speak Pam "...I'm sorry.$s"/pause 500/speak Pam "I'll do whatever you say...$s"/pause 500/animate Robin false true 150 34 35/pause 500/speak Penny "Mom...$s"/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Penny "Don't worry... I understand why you get angry sometimes. Your life hasn't been so easy...$s"/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Robin 1/speak Pam "Thanks, kid.$h#$b#From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?#$b#I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore...$s#$b#I'm gonna try to turn my life around..."/emote Penny 20/pause 100/animate Penny false true 200 0 1 2 3/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 0 2/pause 500/positionOffset Penny 0 8/animate Penny false true 100 39/warp Pam -100 -100/playSound coin/pause 3000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 400/playMusic none/pause 1000/end
